title: ONE PIECE EPISODE 567 REACTION!
author: According to Lucky
description: A reaction video to One Piece Episode 567, featuring commentary on Luffy's Elephant Gatling attack and the dramatic conclusion of the Noah crisis.

title: SHIRAHOSHI IS THE QUEEN!!?! | One Piece Episode 567 Couples Reaction & Discussion
author: AllonaShareeTV
description: A couples reaction and discussion video focused on Shirahoshi's role in Episode 567, particularly her awakening powers as Poseidon.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: May contain discussion of Shirahoshi's identity as Poseidon revealed in subsequent episodes

title: The One Piece Podcast - Episode 567 Video Commentary
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: Video commentary for Episode 567 included as a special feature on the Season 9 Voyage 5 DVD/Blu-ray release, discussing the climax of the Fish-Man Island arc.

title: Episode 567 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page documenting Episode 567, including plot summary, character appearances, manga chapters adapted, production credits, and trivia.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Wiki may contain links and references to future story developments

title: One Piece Episode 567 - Crunchyroll
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming of Episode 567 on Crunchyroll with English subtitles. Originally available through simulcast on October 6, 2012.

title: 567-570: Stop, Noah! Desperate Elephant Gatling!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A blog post covering episodes 567-570, discussing the conclusion of the Noah crisis and the revelations about Shirahoshi's powers.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Covers multiple episodes including reveals about the Ancient Weapon Poseidon

title: Chapter 647 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Wiki page for manga Chapter 647 'Stop, Noah' which was adapted in Episode 567, providing manga comparison and additional context.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Manga wiki may contain references to future developments
